attributes.action: I would like to stop people wrongly parking in parent and child spaces.
attributes.additional_details: On many occasions I have confronted people who have clearly parked wrongfully in these spaces & also made parking attendants aware & no action has been taken. I would like stricter actions for people who abuse the car parking spaces.
attributes.background: I am starting this petition from experiencing a lot of people wrongly parking in parent and child bays. I have witnessed people constantly taking these spaces having no children with them & finding myself & other mums unable to park in the provided spaces because of it.
